instanceInterruptionBehavior.description: The behavior when a Spot Instance is interrupted. Valid values include `hibernate`, `stop`, `terminate` . The default is `terminate`.

maxPrice.description: The maximum hourly price that you're willing to pay for a Spot Instance.

spotInstanceType.description: The Spot Instance request type. Valid values include `one-time`, `persistent`. Persistent Spot Instance requests are only supported when the instance interruption behavior is either hibernate or stop. The default is `one-time`.

validUntil.description: The end date of the request, in UTC format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ). Supported only for persistent requests.
